metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Take Your Mama is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Take Your Mama has sections analyzed in the following keys: B♭ Mixolydian,  and B♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
